features: DOLLAR SHAVE CLUB 4 BLADE STARTER SET INCLUDES: 1 Diamond patterned grip club series handle, 4 replacement stainless-steel club series razor cartridges and 1 Shave Cream (3oz)
FOR LONGER HAIR: Great for longer hair and hard-to-shave spots.
THE RAZOR: 4 precision cut, stainless-steel club series razor blades in a compact razor head help you achieve an effortless shave. Razor Blades spaced for easy rinsing.
THE HANDLE: Weighty, diamond-patterned grip club series handle designed for ultimate comfort and control.
SHAVE CREAM: Helps keep your skin hydrated. Formulated with aloe leaf juice, macadamia oils and coconut oils. Get ready for a shave with a soothing, cool feel.
body.description: As part of our mission to help guys look, feel, and smell their best, Dollar Shave Club razors were made with your skin and hair in mind. The Dollar Shave Club 4-Blade Razor bundle for all-terrain shaving contains four razor cartridges with four stainless steel blades, a weighty, rubber grip handle and our rich, cushiony Shave Cream. Each of the four blades are precisely spaced, wide enough to allow thick and long hair to pass through with ease, as well as helping to prevent annoying pulling and tugging. The handle is thoughtfully designed with a rubber grip to help prevent any unwanted slipping or sliding. These razors for men and women can tackle the wildest of hair forests and the stubbliest of beard thickets, making it the perfect razor for the all-terrain shaver no matter the body parts you're shaving. And don't forget to apply your new favorite shaving cream: Dollar Shave Club Shave Cream. This pillowy Shave Cream is not only comfortable, it's super helpful at preventing nicks and cuts by creating a cushiony layer while shaving. Prickly faces and untamed armpits agree this razor's the real deal. So if you've got hair, the 4-Blade all-terrain razor's got you. When you're ready for more blades, check out our 4-Blade refill 12-pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the dollar shave club for almost 10 years, seems like forever. I just don’t like to even try to find a better one when this one works well for me and my skin can be sensitive if I’m not getting a good close shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Shaving Experience - Dollar Shave Club 4-Blade Razor Set Delivers Smooth Results!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Dollar Shave Club 4-Blade Razor Set in Black/Teal, and I am beyond impressed with the exceptional shaving experience it provides. This value bundle, which includes the Diamond Grip Club Razor Handle, 4-Blade Club Razor Cartridges, and Shave Cream with Aloe and Coconut Oil, has transformed my shaving routine into a comfortable and efficient process. Allow me to share my experience with this outstanding product.First and foremost, the Dollar Shave Club 4-Blade Razor Set offers an incredibly close and smooth shave. The four blades effortlessly glide across the skin, removing hair with precision and minimizing the need for multiple passes. The result is a clean and irritation-free shave that leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed.The Diamond Grip Club Razor Handle is a standout feature of this set. Its easy-to-grip design provides excellent control and maneuverability, ensuring a comfortable and steady shave. The handle's textured surface enhances grip, even when wet, reducing the chances of accidental slips or cuts. This ergonomic design allows for a confident and precise shaving experience.The 4-Blade Club Razor Cartridges are exceptionally sharp and durable. They provide long-lasting performance, maintaining their sharpness through multiple uses. The precision-engineered blades effortlessly cut through facial hair, delivering consistent and reliable results. The cartridges are easy to attach and remove from the handle, making blade replacement a quick and hassle-free process.The included Shave Cream with Aloe and Coconut Oil adds another layer of luxury to the shaving experience. This cream offers a rich and moisturizing lather that softens the hair and prepares the skin for a smooth shave. The combination of aloe and coconut oil soothes and nourishes the skin, reducing irritation and leaving it feeling refreshed. The cream's pleasant scent adds an extra touch of enjoyment to the shaving routine.Moreover, the value provided by this Dollar Shave Club set is exceptional. The bundle offers everything needed for a superior shaving experience at an affordable price. The quality and performance of the razor handle, cartridges, and shave cream rival that of high-end brands, making this set a cost-effective choice without compromising on results.Lastly, I must mention the excellent customer service provided by Dollar Shave Club. They prioritize customer satisfaction and ensure a seamless ordering and delivery process. Their commitment to providing a superior shaving experience is evident, and it further reinforces my confidence in their brand.In conclusion, the Dollar Shave Club 4-Blade Razor Set is a game-changer for anyone seeking a close and comfortable shave. Its exceptional performance, easy-to-grip handle, sharp razor cartridges, moisturizing shave cream, excellent value, and outstanding customer service make it a top choice for a superior shaving experience. I highly recommend this set to anyone in search of a high-quality and affordable shaving solution. Choose the Dollar Shave Club 4-Blade Razor Set and enjoy the luxury of a smooth and effortless shave!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dad love it
reviews.reviewText: My dad was very happy that I got him this kit, it really helped him out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were gifts for 2 teenage boys and they were so excited to get these and start shaving. There is info to order more blades but we still have not had to do this as the blades stand up to so much use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saving $isn't always a top priority
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and have almost filed for bankruptcy cause of the cost to shave. Until I found these amazing blades. The price is great, but the durability and comfort are second to none. I couldn’t believe that I used one blade for almost two months. Normally, an outrageously expensive blade will dent or because sharp and feel like I shaved with a lions claw. This appears to be a premium product at a discount rate.You have a long term customer here. 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cartridge clip bends or wears over time, then cartridges pop off.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product 18 months ago. I had no complaints until about 3 months ago, when cartridges started to pop off the handle at the slightest touch, when using the edge trimmer blade. The cartridge clip (circled in red in my picture) seems to become less effective over time. I am not sure why. I was able to fix the problem temporarily by bending the clip in the direction of the cartridge attachment point with a pair of needle-nose pliers. Unfortunately, the problem has returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good razor and cream
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to replace my Gillette Mach 3 for which the refills had gotten pretty expensive. The razors are great and cost about 1/2 or less than the Gillette refills I wasn't sure about the shave cream as I generally use Pacific Shaving Company Natural Shaving Cream. While Pacific is still better, the Dollar Shave Club shave cream is decent. I like the menthol. Overall I'm pleased and will switch for razor refills for sure.
